casebody.data:
175 A.3d 155 ALL RISK, INC., D/B/A ALL RISK RESTORATION AND DAMAGE CONTRACTORS, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. MERION REALTY, LLC, AND MERION INN MANAGEMENT, INC., DEFENDANTS-PETITIONERS, AND VICTORIA WATSON, DEFENDANT.

C-232 September Term 2017

078870 October 26, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001583-13 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

*299It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
